text: Va Alloh misoli du mardi digarero ʙajon mekunad, ki jake gung astu namefahmad va fahmonida nametavonad va ʙar hec ciz qudrate nadorad va u ʙar xocai xud garon ast, har co ki uro ʙifiristad, hec foidae hosil namekunad. Ojo in mard ʙo on kas, ki mardumro ʙa adl farmon medihad va xud ʙar rohi rost meravad, ʙaroʙar ast? (Pas, ci guna ʙajni ʙutoni gungu kar va ʙajni Allohi qodiru mun'im ʙaroʙar medoned)
